entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
